reviewText: This is a fabulous movie for Spanish class.  Good storyline, (no sex), funny and serious.  My students are spellbound as they watch it.  Need an international format DVD player.

If you're interested in the Spanish Civil War, this is a great movie to watch. The focus is not on the war, although it is always there, but on the heroic things regular people do under horrific circumstances. It is a celebration of life.
